author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-9949] Fix the race condition between Compaction and StoreScanner.init

Summary: The StoreScanner constructor has multiple stages and there can be a race betwwen an ongoing compaction and the StoreScanner constructor where we might get the list of scanners before a compaction and seek on those scanners after the compaction.

author: liyin
msg: [0.89-fb] [master] Enable ServerManager to pick up config changes online for resending messages
Summary: Enable ServerManager to pick up config changes online for resending messages
Test Plan: added a unit test
